name: Soul Eater: Monotone Princess
description: Soul Eater: Monotone Princess (ソウルイーター モノトーン プリンセス, Sōru Ītā Monotōn Purinsesu) is an action adventure game released exclusively on the Wii in Japan. The game was created and developed by Square Enix with BONES Studio and released in September 25, 2008. The game revolves around Death Weapon Meister Academy and Maka's Team as they battle against the elusive Paraponera Clan.
